product_name: Pocket Guide to Emergency First Aid
long_description: The. Authors: Betty Cordes, Ron Cordes and Gary LaFontaine. Softcover; 25 pages; illustrations. Northern Lights Publishing; copyright 2010. Spiral-bound guide measures just 4 1/2 x 3 1/2 inches so it fits nicely in a pocket. Indexed tabs let you quickly flip to the desired page. The. Also covers snake bites, poison, splints, bone injuries, seizures, spinal injuries, CPR, heat and frost injuries, eye injuries and burns.
short_description: The Pocket Guide to Emergency First Aid is filled with important information to help you administer first aid.
